name: Frick the R.N.G!
description:
Game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022, with a theme "Roll of the Dice" by me - sledzik089.

Recomended playing  maximized.

Click and drag on the dice to throw it.

The Randomness in games is too unfair, change it, crush you oponents using your skill when the odds aren't in your favour,  And have fun!

Game made in unity.

Graphics made using Aseprite, Gimp and Paint xd.

SFX made in sfxr.

Font used: DPComic by codeman38 cody@zone38.net http://www.zone38.net/
